long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play Kobra vs Blocks Game online for free

INTRODUCTION
Control the Kobra’s direction to collect items that will make its size increase.

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Kobra vs Blocks extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Kobra vs Blocks icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Kobra vs Blocks popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

You also can play more games from the top-left menu


HOW TO PLAY?
Use the button [ < ] & [ > ] to guide a Kobra of balls and break the bricks.
Try to break as many bricks as possible.
Get additional balls and make the biggest Kobra ever!

Play more games on the top-left menu

Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores!
